title: Bottle

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a bottle, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front perspective view of my new design for a bottle;
FIG. 2 is a left side elevational view of the embodiment depicted in FIG. 1, the right side being the mirror image thereof;
FIG. 3 is a front elevational view of the embodiment depicted in FIG. 1, the back side being the mirror image thereof; and,
FIG. 4 is a top view of the embodiment depicted in FIG. 1.
The broken line showing is for illustrative purposes only, and forms no part of the claimed design.
